name: SmokeBallRespring
author: Osctardo
description:
**A *"smoke ball"* respring animation for Anemone.**


Originally requested by u/Cyko__, u/Momoske (Osctardo) decided to make a "Smoke Ball" animation for all devices with the 7 different resolutions:

- 1136x640 (iPhone 5s)
- 1334x750 (iPhone 6/7/8)
- 1472x828 (iPhone 6/7/8 upscaled)
- 1920x1080 (iPhone 6+/7+/8+)
- 2208x1242 (iPhone 6+/7+/8+ upscaled)
- 2436x1125 (iPhone X)
- 2688x1242 (iPhone X upscaled)


In the comments of the [UPCOMING] post on r/jailbreak, 2 other people (u/MatRanc and u/R3IZ4) requested for:

- An *"Apple Glitch"* respring animation
- A *"Verbose"* respring animation, which was both reworked and updated to look great on all these devices and resolutions


This is the *"Smoke Ball"* respring animation.
